value.0:
How to Craft Basic weapons:

You will require access to proper materials such as iron, steel, or even more valuable metals. Then, you must have access to a proper workstation, an anvil is required for armory.


Bullet:
Use the hammer three times.  Followed by the tongs three times.

Dagger:
Use the tongs and hammer.  Then tongs, hammer twice and tongs again.

Mace:
First hammer, then tongs and hammer again.  Use the tongs twice then bellows.

Sickle:
Hammer then use the bellows.  Hammer twice again, then the tongs and the bellows.

Morningstar:
Hammer and hammer again.  Use the bellows, then finish with the hammer.

Throwing Axes:
Use the hammer then tongs.  Repeat, then use the bellows twice.

Light Hammer:
Use the Hammer, then the bellows twice.  Finish with the tongs hammer and tongs again.

Handaxe:
Start with tongs.  Move on to the hammer, tongs, then bellows twice.  Finish with the hammer.

Kukri:
Use the tongs twice, then the hammer.  Tongs again, hammer and hammer again.

Short Sword:
Start with the tongs moving into two strokes with the hammer.  Then two blasts of the bellows and finish with the tongs.

Battleaxe:
Begin with bellows moving into the hammer and tongs.  Then hammer twice and finish with the tongs.

Longsword:
For this item start with the tongs, then hammer and bellows.  End with the tongs, hammer and tongs again.

Rapier:
Use the hammer twice, then double blows with the bellows.  Complete the job with the tongs and hammer again.

Scimitar:
Hammer and bellows.  Then hammer twice.  Use the bellows and tongs again.

Warhammer:
Begin with the hammer, moving over to the bellows.  Use the tongs three times and end with the hammer.
